description:
As Yoi Bakufa grew weak, Tendoushuu dissolved it and founded another government as Nobunobu as its shogun.
Nobunobu`s first action was to imprison Shigeshige`s supporters: Matsudaira Katakuriko and Kondou Isao. The second act was to dispand the Shinsengumi and increase the power of its rival, the Mimawarigumi.
Only in three months of time, the new government became vastly unpopular as Nobunobu displayed tyranny and began rebuilding the police forces of Edo.
name: Warui Bakufa
